title: Khloe Kardashian and Kendall Jenner clean up on Malibu beach
text:
The sisters are doing their bit for the environment (Pictures: Backgrid)

Khloe Kardashian and Kendall Jenner have been doing their bit for the environment this week as they helped to clean up a beach in Malibu.

The sisters donned casual clothes and gloves (although they still sported huge shades) as they wandered around, picking up any rubbish in sight.

Volunteering for the Heal The Bay initiative, the pair were followed by a film crew as they clutched onto buckets and spied out any unwelcome trash.

Khloe was followed by a film crew (Picture: BACKGRID)

Khloe kept her eyes on the ground as she looked for any pesky pieces of plastic.

Meanwhile, Kendall could be seen looking particularly disgusted as she held pieces of rubbish at arm’s length.

And they’re not the only members of the Kardashian/Jenner clan to be taking action against the climate crisis this week, after their sister Kim has been planning to have dinner with young activist Greta Thunberg.

The mum-of-four, who recently spoke out about monitoring her kids on social media, described the 16-year-old as ‘such a brave and strong young woman.’

Adding that she’d love her kids to meet her, she pointed out that the activist is ‘so brave and courageous to stand up to these grown-ups that can be very scary and for her to be so open and honest is exactly what we need.’

Kendall looked a little disgusted by the rubbish (Picture: BACKGRID)

Speaking to Reuters, Kim said she would ‘absolutely’ like to go to dinner with Greta, adding: ‘I would really love to speak to her parents and to see how they’ve encouraged her. Did she always have that in her?’

Meanwhile, Kim and Kourtney recently joined the Armenian President Armen Sarkissian for dinner during their trip.

The sisters joined volunteers on Malibu beach (Picture: DOBN / BACKGRID)

The pair were blessed with flowers as they arrived at the Presidential palace on Wednesday evening, dressing in all black for the occasion.

The dinner seemed to go without a hitch, with the Keeping Up With The Kardashians stars pictured raising a toast with the President.

They were also seen linking arms with Sarkissian on the visit.

Y’know, just your standard holiday.
